caption.title: Future risk of ZIKV outbreaks.
caption.p:
(A) The evolution of the immunity status per age group in a population of 10,000 agents for the next 80 years based on the demographic structure of Nicaragua. (B) Heat map of the distribution of the attack rates resulting from the reintroduction of ZIKV in the population at each year (1000 simulations for each year). (C) The evolution of the proportion of reintroductions resulting in outbreaks (with a threshold of 1%) with time (green), proportion of susceptible (orange), and effective reproduction number
R e
(purple).
